column1: CREATE TABLE `tb_goods_type` ( `id` INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `create_time` TEXT NOT NULL, `update_time` TEXT NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE `tb_goods` ( `id` INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `number` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `type` INTEGER NOT NULL, `unit` INTEGER, `create_time` TEXT NOT NULL, `update_time` TEXT NOT NULL, `expiration_time` TEXT );
